MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the EH41 postcode area of Haddington, affecting properties in Easter Dunkeld and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 2.44pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.52pm on Thursday 21st January 2021.
